org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore

Class ShardCommitCoordinator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.ShardCommitCoordinator

  • public class ShardCommitCoordinator
extends java.lang.Object
    Coordinates commits for a shard ensuring only one concurrent 3-phase commit.
    Author:
    Thomas Pantelis

    • Method Detail

      • transactionReady

        public void transactionReady(java.lang.String transactionID,
                    DOMStoreThreePhaseCommitCohort cohort,
                    Modification modification)
        This method caches a cohort entry for the given transactions ID in preparation for the subsequent 3-phase commit.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the ID of the transaction
        cohort - the cohort to participate in the transaction commit
        modification - the modification made by the transaction

      • handleCanCommit

        public void handleCanCommit(CanCommitTransaction canCommit,
                   akka.actor.ActorRef sender,
                   akka.actor.ActorRef shard)
        This method handles the canCommit phase for a transaction.
        Parameters:
        canCommit - the CanCommitTransaction message
        sender - the actor that sent the message
        shard - the transaction's shard actor

      • getCohortEntryIfCurrent

        public org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.ShardCommitCoordinator.CohortEntry getCohortEntryIfCurrent(java.lang.String transactionID)
        Returns the cohort entry for the Tx commit currently in progress if the given transaction ID matches the current entry.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the ID of the transaction
        Returns:
        the current CohortEntry or null if the given transaction ID does not match the current entry.

      • getCurrentCohortEntry

        public org.opendaylight.controller.cluster.datastore.ShardCommitCoordinator.CohortEntry getCurrentCohortEntry()

      • removeCohortEntry

        public void removeCohortEntry(java.lang.String transactionID)

      • isCurrentTransaction

        public boolean isCurrentTransaction(java.lang.String transactionID)

      • currentTransactionComplete

        public void currentTransactionComplete(java.lang.String transactionID,
                              boolean removeCohortEntry)
        This method is called when a transaction is complete, successful or not. If the given given transaction ID matches the current in-progress transaction, the next cohort entry, if any, is dequeued and processed.
        Parameters:
        transactionID - the ID of the completed transaction
        removeCohortEntry - if true the CohortEntry for the transaction is also removed from the cache.
